text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
A few days later, I go to the cafeteria<n>for my break and
happen to see<n>Kawakami Princess's two friends.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Hey, don't you think we should stop<n>her?

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: You're right... That's simply too<n>much.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I glance over to where the two are<n>looking and see
Kawakami Princess. It<n>seems like she's just relaxing with<n>
some tea...

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
Ergh... Why're these little teacups so<n>hard to hold? It's
making my... fingers<n>tired...

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: Ouch, that's hot! It's okay, just need<n>to stay calm...

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
Hooohohoho, there's nothing more<n>princess-like than
enjoying a nice cup<n>of tea in the afternoon!

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: This is weird. She wasn't always like<n>this, right?

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
Well, she's on her twentieth cup of<n>tea. That much can't be
good for the<n>body...

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
And she used to eat big, heaping<n>plates of food. Now she
barely eats at<n>all.

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
I think she was saying that<n>princesses are too elegant to
eat more<n>than a handful of anything.
choice_data_list: (Elegant? That reminds me...)

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
Yeah, that! She's elegant! That's<n>what really makes a<n>
princess—elegance!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
She admires King Halo's refined<n>manners, but from what
her friends<n>are saying, she might be taking things<n>a little
too far.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
Aaagh! Kawakami disappeared while<n>we were standing
here yappin'!<n>Where'd she go?!

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
Oh, who knows? We've got practice<n>to get to, so let's have
a talk with her<n>later.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
The two move on with their day, but<n>I'm starting to get more
worried than<n>them.
choice_data_list:
Maybe I should look for her. I could ask what's
going on.

Maybe I should look for her. I could ask what's
going on.

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: Urrrp... My stomach's about to burst...

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
Wait, I can't let a little hardship get<n>me down! This is all part
of a<n>princess's mission—for elegance!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: Erk... Ugh...
choice_data_list: Hi, mind if we chat a little?

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
Gah! Y-you've got it all wrong—I<n>didn't puke! I managed to
keep it<n>down!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: Wait, is that you, Trainer? Hellothere... Ungh. Isn't it a nice day?
choice_data_list: No need to push yourself!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
P-push myself? I'm just taking a<n>nice, elegant walk, as
princesses do.
choice_data_list: You don't have to try to be elegant all the time.

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: Try to be? W-wait, don't tell me you<n>know!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: You know I'm training myself to be<n>elegant?!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
I'm so sorry for losing my cool. I had<n>no idea anyone would
be able to tell I<n>was practicing.
choice_data_list: Practicing for what exactly?

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
Well, of course, to act in the proper,<n>dignified manner of a
princess. You<n>know, cause princesses have to be<n>all
graceful and elegant.
choice_data_list: Like King Halo?

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Looks like I hit the nail on the head,<n>but Kawakami suddenly
seems<n>disappointed.

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
I'm so shocked someone found out...<n>But you're right. I
was practicing so I<n>could become like King.

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
I've always looked up to how strong<n>Princess Fighter is.
Once I came to the<n>academy though, I met King Halo,<n>and...

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
I realized a princess needs to be<n>refined and graceful, like
her! That's<n>why I'm going to follow her example,<n>and—
choice_data_list: Wait, what example do you mean?

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
Well, like, she never goes up stairs<n>two at a time, or chugs
down fizzy<n>drinks, or eats from a giant bowl of<n>food...
choice_data_list: How's that going?

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
It's going... Actually, it's not going<n>well at all. I don't feel
even a tiny bit<n>like her.

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
The tryouts are already coming up,<n>but I wonder if someone
like me can<n>really become a princess before<n>then...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I see what she's worried about, but<n>I'm starting to think it
might not be the<n>best for her. How do I tell her that<n>
though?
choice_data_list:
Why don't we go see the real deal one more
time?

Why don't we go see the real deal one more
time?

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
Hm? Go see King? But I've already<n>watched her a whole
bunch.
choice_data_list: There's always something new you can learn.
There's always something new you can learn.

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: Well, if you say so, I guess it might be<n>good.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Exhale... Hup!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
Aaaah! She really is wonderful! Just<n>look at that dignified
form—that<n>graceful movement!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
Only King could run so elegantly! It's<n>what a princess
should be... Ah!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Crash!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Ugh... I'm not done yet!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
Wow... She fell, but she's still going,<n>even all covered in
mud. How noble,<n>how beautiful...
choice_data_list: But she doesn't need to go that far, right?

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
Of course she does! She's<n>determined to go as far as it
takes to<n>be first-rate!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
She has an unshakable ideal, no<n>matter what other people
might think!<n>That's why she's a bright, shining<n>example
of—oh.

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
I get it... The thing that makes her so<n>dignified comes from
the inside.

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
That's why it was so hard for me. If I<n>just copy how she
moves, I'm still<n>empty on the inside...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
It's strange to see her this sad...<n>Does she really think
she's empty<n>inside?
choice_data_list:
I think you've simply lost sight of something
important.

I think you've simply lost sight of something
important.

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: Huh?

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
It's my dream—I'm the one who<n>decides it, and I'm the one
who will<n>achieve it.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: She knew exactly what her dream<n>was back then.
choice_data_list:
Surely you have an ideal of your own to work
towards.

Surely you have an ideal of your own to work
towards.

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
Really? You mean I don't just have<n>to copy Princess
Fighter or King Halo?
choice_data_list:
Don't rush it. It'll come if you think about it
carefully.

Don't rush it. It'll come if you think about it
carefully.

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: You're... right. I still have time before<n>the tryouts.
choice_data_list: I'll be there to cheer you on.
I'll be there to cheer you on.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Kawakami Princess nods along,<n>though she still seems
uneasy<n>watching King Halo.
